name: Forbidden Moulchemy
description:
You are the High Moulchemist, a reclusive potion-slinging mouse with an aptitude for terrorizing the local townsfolk. You've just made your biggest score yet, sneaking in beneath the cover of night and stealing their entire supply of gourmet cheese! Unfortunately, this is one transgression that they won't take sitting down. Brew up some poison flasks in a hurry and stage your last stand against the hordes of mice you've slighted! Created for Mini Jam 129 based on the theme "Poison" and with the limitation "You are not a hero".

MECHANICS

Click on flasks as they fly out of the cauldron to freeze them in midair, then click again in any direction to toss them at your foes. Freeze multiple flasks in succession to fire off a barrage and score combo points!

Throwing Green Flasks produces a small poison explosion.
Throwing Purple Flasks produces a large poison explosion.
Defeating Radioactive Mice allows you to brew up a frenzy of potions for a few seconds.

CONTROLS

GRAB/THROW FLASK: Left Click
